Get a single referendum's data from sudd.ch

Source: R/c2d-GEN.R
sudd_referendum.Rd

Downloads a single referendum's data from sudd.ch.

sudd_referendum(id_sudd)

Arguments

id_sudd

The referendum's identifier assigned by sudd.ch.

Value

A tibble. The column names are aligned with those of referendums() as closely as possible.

Examples

c2d::referendum(id = "5bbc045192a21351232e596f")$id_sudd |> c2d::sudd_referendum()

#> # A tibble: 1 × 24
#>   country_code country_name_de territory_type_de  date       title_de           
#>   <chr>        <chr>           <chr>              <date>     <chr>              
#> 1 LI           Liechtenstein   unabhängiger Staat 2015-12-13 Krankenversicherun…
#> # … with 19 more variables: question_type_de <chr>, types <list>,
#> #   result_de <chr>, adoption_requirements_de <list>, electorate_total <int>,
#> #   polling_cards <int>, votes_total <int>, votes_invalid <int>,
#> #   votes_empty <int>, votes_void <int>, votes_valid <int>, votes_yes <int>,
#> #   votes_no <int>, vote_channel_de <chr>, vote_channel_url <chr>,
#> #   remarks <chr>, sources <list>, result_status_de <chr>,
#> #   date_time_last_edited <date>
